title: MythDora 5 I386 DVD ISO
description:
Version 5.0 Highlights:
	Based on Fedora 8 
	MythDora is now being built with Pungi. This will help greatly in future releases and upgrades. 
	kernel-2.6.24.4-64.fc8 
	MythTV 0.21, with default settings customized for MythDora 
	Numerous DVB/V4L kernel patches for improved capture card autodetection 
	New install process, featuring the anaconda installer GUI, heavily customized for MythDora. 
	Firstboot customizations for MythDora, with new GUI menu setup partially integrated. 
	Both DVD and CD install disks, as well as a network-installable tree and yum repositories 
	A very nice database backup module in MythDora Tools 
	You install using custom instead of auto install. This is still very easy and you can customize your system the way you want it. 
	Four window managers are included - Gnome, KDE, XfCE4, and Ratpoison, with Gnome being the default 
	Ability to start with MythWelcome, normal frontend or nothing at login time. 
	Tons of different game emulators (Don&#039;t ask us how to use them) 
	Latest nVidia & nVidia Legacy drivers. 
	Latest ATI/AMD video drivers. 
	Latest OpenChrome video drivers. 
	Latest ivtv drivers, including X driver for the PVR-350. 
	/video is now called /storage 
	/misc/extras is now located in /storage/misc/extras 
	/usr/local/pvr is now /usr/share/mythdora 
	K9copy (DVD shrink for Linux) 
	Nuvexport 
	Up-to-date video4linux drivers 
	

Please see http://mythdora.com for more information.
